tweet: I'm really f* tired of sifting through comments asking me to stay in my lane and only talk about Litecoin. My interests are in crypto.
If you only want Litecoin news, please unfollow me and follow @litecoin @LTCFoundation @litecoinCA. I will start blocking complainers. 😡
In keeping with tradition, kids of parents who present LTC cards receive full-size candy bars.
Sorry, livestream is here ( https://t.co/jIWtSjIhp6). This is an easy one fore me, because the future of Bitcoin is Litecoin. :D
@edgardrobit @litecoin @LTCFoundation @litecoinCA With 180k followers, I have to not read and reply to comments OR block people that add noise to my feed. Back to what's important... NO2X! 😀
